attributes.action: provide more funding in the provision of insulin pumps for type1 diabetics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i recently attended my diabetic checkup appointment as my blood glucose control was becoming very irregular. i was informed by my consultant that this was caused by wrong uses of my injection sites but i cant use other injection sites as i have to wear loads of protective equipment in my job so i was refered to an insulin pump consultant and was found to be a perfect candidate but........ there is no funding for insulin pumps in my area. sort it out gordon my life depends on it!!!!
